content: instructions for crown decreases and finishing as for hat 1 blocking to block the hats leave them to soak for a few minutes in lukewarm water then gently squeeze out as much water as possible lay the hats flat on a towel and smooth out with your hands leave to dry completely add a pom pom or a tassel if you desire thank you for choosing the wool barn knits pattern for questions and pattern support please email maya@thewoolbarn com share your makes on instagram using hashtag #thewoolbarn for hand dyed yarn visit www thewoolbarn com 5 three quick hats © 2023 maya davis pattern for personal use only all rights reserved
